default_track_speed_sidereal.help: Default slewing speed in multiple of sidereal rate.

default_guide_speed_sidereal.help: Default guiding speed in multiple of sidereal rate.

correction_speed_sidereal.help: Default correction speed in multiple of sidereal rate.

min_slew_angle.help: Min slew angle, in deg. Angle difference below this value will be approached by correction alone.

min_correction_time.help: Minimum correction time in milliseconds. Corrections less than this will be ignored.

max_correction_angle.help: Max correction angle in deg. Corrections larger than this value will still be executed, but give you a warning since it will take a long time and something is likely wrong.

max_guide_time.help: Maximum guiding time in milliseconds. Guide pulses larger than this value will be truncated.

acceleration_step_time.help: Acceleration step time in milliseconds. The default value should work for most situations.
